title: Police Inaction Alleged in Ludhiana Kidnapping Case
author: Unknown
summary: A kidnapping case has been reported in Ludhiana, Punjab, where a local political figure allegedly abducted a young girl in apparent retaliation against her brother who had filed a complaint against him. Despite the severity of the situation, local authorities have reportedly not taken action.
content:
A concerning incident of alleged kidnapping has been reported in Ludhiana, Punjab, where a locally influential political figure is accused of abducting a young girl. According to reports, the kidnapping appears to be an act of retaliation after the victim's brother filed a complaint against the accused.

Sources indicate that the alleged perpetrator has been openly boasting about the kidnapping, while law enforcement has yet to take any action in the case. The lack of police response has raised concerns about potential political interference in the investigation.
